org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap

Class ReferenceAttributeMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap.AttributeMapper
      • org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap.ReferenceAttributeMapper

  • public final class ReferenceAttributeMapper
extends AttributeMapper
    An attribute mapper which provides a mapping from a JSON value to a single DN valued LDAP attribute.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T isRequired()
      Indicates that the LDAP attribute is mandatory and must be provided during create requests.
      T isSingleValued()
      Indicates that multi-valued LDAP attribute should be represented as a single-valued JSON value, rather than an array of values.
      ReferenceAttributeMapper searchFilter(Filter filter)
      Sets the filter which should be used when searching for referenced LDAP entries.
      ReferenceAttributeMapper searchFilter(String filter)
      Sets the filter which should be used when searching for referenced LDAP entries.
      ReferenceAttributeMapper searchScope(SearchScope scope)
      Sets the search scope which should be used when searching for referenced LDAP entries.
      String toString() 
      T writability(WritabilityPolicy policy)
      Indicates whether or not the LDAP attribute supports updates.

    • Method Detail

      • searchFilter

        public ReferenceAttributeMapper searchFilter(Filter filter)
        Sets the filter which should be used when searching for referenced LDAP entries. The default is (objectClass=*).
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter which should be used when searching for referenced LDAP entries.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.

      • searchScope

        public ReferenceAttributeMapper searchScope(SearchScope scope)
        Sets the search scope which should be used when searching for referenced LDAP entries. The default is SearchScope.WHOLE_SUBTREE.
        Parameters:
        scope - The search scope which should be used when searching for referenced LDAP entries.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.

        public final T isRequired()
        Indicates that the LDAP attribute is mandatory and must be provided during create requests.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.

      • isSingleValued

        public final T isSingleValued()
        Indicates that multi-valued LDAP attribute should be represented as a single-valued JSON value, rather than an array of values.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.

      • writability

        public final T writability(WritabilityPolicy policy)
        Indicates whether or not the LDAP attribute supports updates. The default is WritabilityPolicy.READ_WRITE.
        Parameters:
        policy - The writability policy.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.
